title: ‘Survivor,’ Season 41, Episode 3
description:
Tyson Apostol is joined by The Ringer’s Mallory Rubin and Riley McAtee to discuss all things Episode 3. They break down all the twists and turns and weigh in on how they’d handle this season’s surprises. Plus, another update on their beards and superlatives.
Host: Tyson Apostol
Guest: Mallory Rubin and Riley McAtee
Editor: Mike Wargon
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
